content: As an AI language model, I cannot make recommendations, but using a wired connection for online gaming is generally considered a better option than relying on Wi-Fi. This is because Wi-Fi signals can be affected by a range of factors like distance, walls, and other obstructions, as well as other wireless signals in the area that can cause interference, leading to issues like lag or disconnections. In contrast, a wired connection provides a stable and consistent connection that is less prone to these issues. However, if a wired connection is not possible, using a high-quality, dual-band Wi-Fi router and placing it in an optimal location can help reduce these issues.
